forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 52. West wind around 17 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 59. West wind 16 to 23 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph.

weather_report:
As dawn breaks over Downtown San Francisco, the city emerges primarily clear, yet the chill of the overnight air lingers, settling around 52 degrees. A brisk west wind whispers through the streets, reminding early risers of the unique character of this coastal town. The sun prepares to make its ascent, promising a day filled with gentle warmth; expect the mercury to rise just enough to brush against a pleasant 59 degrees. 

Though the morning seems largely devoid of fog, those familiar with the often capricious marine layer might find lingering wisps near the Golden Gate, where the contours of the landscape kiss the misty bay. The wind's playful gusts, reaching into the high twenties, will add a layer of robust character, urging residents to consider their layers wisely. A light jacket would serve well, as will comfortable shoes for a morning stroll or a leisurely bike ride along the Embarcadero, perhaps stopping by a local café for a warm drink. The unfolding day invites exploration; meander through the vibrant streets or engage in quiet contemplation in one of the city's lovely parks, the kind of moments that make life here all the more enchanting.
